1.1.0.name: connect20/Netmatter_Bridge
1.1.0.description: The Volo extension to Magento, powered by Netmatter, allows all high performance Magento stores – from single instance up to multiple, multi-lingual stores – to carry out 2-way bulk data transfers with the Volo platform in real time, with no loss of Magento performance.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
